```{r echo=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(plotly)
```


## MPG vs Weight

```{r mtcars,echo=FALSE}
p <- ggplot(data = mtcars, mapping = aes(x = wt, y = mpg, group = cyl,color = cyl)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_smooth(formula = y~x,method = "lm",se = FALSE)
gg <- ggplotly(p)
gg
```
